extensionAttribute.description: Displays the date and time of the last agent check-in for Jamf Protect
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh
#Jamf Protect Location jamfProtectBinaryLocation="/usr/local/bin/protectctl"
if [ -f "$jamfProtectBinaryLocation" ]; then jamfProtectLastCheckin=$("$jamfProtectBinaryLocation" info | sed -n '4 p' | awk -F 'Last Check-in:' '{print $2}' | xargs) else jamfProtectLastCheckin="Does not exist" fi
echo "jamfProtectLastCheckin" echo "<result>$jamfProtectLastCheckin</result>"
